discharge.label: Discharge
discharge.description: Certain functions use up all the energy currently stored in your innovation. When you use a function that has the discharge trait, you lose charge until you gain it again (typically with Empower). Recharging to full capacity takes time, and consequently, you can use only one discharge function per round, even if you regain charge immediately.
